summary: Add a female follower of two people
descriptionHtml:
This MOD will add the Twofollowers
It is the ordinary woman

This Mod is Standalone
Women immortality attribute & All Marriageable
I created this in ECE MOD


Her name is Reica

She meet in Dawnstar WindPeak Inn

She has a fire attribute

Learning skills
one-handed
Two-handed
Block
Archery
Heavy&LightArmor

LearningPower=magic
FireBullet attack the target with fire
FireHart Recover target in flames

:Bodysize=SeveNsbaseNaturalBody

Because it is the ordinary woman, unarmed attack is also good



Her name is Sana
She meet in HonningbrewMeadery
She has a fire attribute

Learning skills
one-handed
Archery
LightArmor
Destruction
Restoraction
Lockpicking

LearningPower=magic
IcyBullet attack the target with Frost
Blizzard Storm attack the target with Frost
ShieldPower Shield blow the target

Bodysize=seveNsbase Bombshell

Because it is the ordinary woman, unarmed attack is also good


They do not have a weapon
There is no armor
Players please separate the items


Recommended Mods
Any of the follower overhaul mods(I'm Use EFFandFLP)

Installation
Please drop into the data folder or NMM installation

I am japanese
I'm sorry I can not English
I am a beginner of MOD production
